Uses of Class
main.java.autograd.Value

Packages that use Value
Package
Description
main.java.autograd
Provides the classes needed for automatic differentiation.
main.java.autograd.utils
Provides the helper classes needed for automatic differentiation.
main.java.mathematics
Provides classes of mathematical objects and operations on them.
main.java.nn.layers
Provides neural network layer classes.
main.java.nn.losses
Provides loss function classes for training neural networks.
